title: Understanding Font Color Change
text: Changing the font color in a cell can help emphasize important information or categorize data visually.

hintAnswer: To help text stand out more and group some text together.
title: Purpose of Font Color Change
text: What is the primary reason for changing the font color in a cell?
choices: To help text stand out more and group some text together
to make the excel sheet more colorful

title: Grouping Text with Color
text: Using the same font color for related data can help visually group them together, making it easier to identify patterns or categories.
